item.title: iOS 26 Adds New Features to Powerbeats Pro 2
item.description: Apple released Powerbeats Pro 2 in February as its first earbuds with heart rate monitoring, and iOS 26 will further enhance that functionality. Many of the improvements will bring the Powerbeats Pro
